statements: SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, consultation_date FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE consultation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, consultation_date, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE consultation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT consultation_notes, consultation_status FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT consultation_date, patient_name FROM consultations JOIN patients ON consultations.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '82749f6e-267b-4d1c-82e1-f0fd511c0c09';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND consultation_status = 'completed';
SELECT patient_name, consultation_notes FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, consultation_date FROM Patients ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, cost FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT progress_status, progress_date FROM ConsultationProgress WHERE progress_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, email FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, TreatmentPlans.plan_name, TreatmentPlans.cost FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentPlans ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentPlans.patient_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT progress_id, progress_status, progress_date FROM ConsultationProgress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress_date ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, TreatmentPlans.plan_name, ConsultationProgress.progress_status FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentPlans ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentPlans.patient_id JOIN ConsultationProgress ON TreatmentPlans.plan_id = ConsultationProgress.plan_id WHERE Patients.age < 50 AND progress_status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT consultation_date, consultation_time, consultation_notes FROM consultations ORDER BY consultation_date ASC, consultation_time ASC;
SELECT plan_description, plan_status FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_status = 'Active';
SELECT progress_description, progress_date FROM progress_reports WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT consultation_date, consultation_time FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date = '2022-09-15' AND consultation_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT plan_description, plan_status FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_status = 'Active' ORDER BY plan_date DESC;
SELECT progress_description, progress_date FROM progress_reports WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM Consultations WHERE status='Active';
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, plan_start_date, plan_end_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE plan_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM Consultations WHERE status='ongoing' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, consultation_id, plan_description FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE plan_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY plan_end_date ASC;
SELECT update_id, plan_id, update_message, update_date FROM ProgressUpdates WHERE update_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
